phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and browse the initial information.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely.

phases.objective: Navigate to Look for a link like 'Learn More', 'Product Details', or 'Features' related to fuel cards.

assertions.description: Verify that verify a clear link to product details or features is present on the homepage.

phases.objective: Click the link to navigate to https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards.

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the '/product-fuel-cards' URL.

phases.objective: Scroll through the 'Fuel card details' page, reading sections about benefits, features, and how it works.

assertions.description: Verify that verify sections for benefits, features, and 'how it works' are present and readable.

phases.objective: Navigate to Spend time examining specific details such as savings opportunities, network acceptance, and management tools.

assertions.description: Verify that verify key details like savings, network acceptance, and management tools are displayed.

test_files.name: Mobile User Quick Scan & Get Started Test
test_files.title: Mobile User Quick Scan & Get Started

phases.objective: Navigate to Access https://www.atob.com via a mobile browser (e.g., Chrome on Android, Safari on iOS).

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads successfully on a mobile browser.
Verify that verify the website displays a mobile-responsive layout.

phases.objective: Navigate to Observe the mobile-responsive layout and scroll through the homepage, tapping on any interactive elements.

assertions.description: Verify that verify homepage elements are correctly sized and tappable on mobile.

phases.objective: Tap the 'Learn More' or 'Product' link, potentially within a hamburger menu, to navigate to https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards.

assertions.description: Verify that verify successful navigation to the '/product-fuel-cards' URL from the mobile menu/link.

phases.objective: Scroll through the 'Fuel card details' page, focusing on bullet points and headlines due to limited screen space.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the product details page content is well-formatted and readable on mobile (e.g., uses bullet points, clear headlines).

phases.objective: Tap the 'Get Started' button or similar call-to-action to proceed to https://www.atob.com/get-started.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the 'Get Started' button is present, tappable, and navigates to the signup page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Attempt to fill out the 'Sign up form' on the mobile interface, using on-screen keyboard.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the signup form fields are correctly aligned, allow input, and the on-screen keyboard appears correctly.

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely.

phases.objective: Navigate to Scan the homepage specifically for 'Pricing', 'Fees', or 'Savings' links or mentions.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the presence of 'Pricing', 'Fees', or 'Savings' links/mentions on the homepage.

phases.objective: Navigate to If no direct link is found, click on 'Learn More' or 'Product Details' to go to https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards, assuming pricing information will be there.

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the product details page or direct pricing page if available.

phases.objective: Navigate to On the 'Fuel card details' page, actively search and scroll for sections detailing transaction fees, monthly charges, fuel discounts, and other cost-related information.

assertions.description: Verify that verify sections detailing transaction fees, monthly charges, and fuel discounts are present.

phases.objective: Navigate to May use browser's 'Find' function (Ctrl+F or Cmd+F) to search for keywords like 'fee', 'cost', 'discount', 'savings'.

assertions.description: Verify that verify relevant keywords like 'fee', 'cost', 'discount', 'savings' are present on the page content.

phases.objective: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com, possibly from a bookmark or memory.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads quickly and completely.

phases.objective: Click on the 'Product Details' or 'Learn More' link to revisit https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards and quickly re-scan key benefits or features.

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the product page and quick scan of benefits/features is possible.

phases.objective: Navigate to Once confident, locate the 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button on the product page or navigate back to the home page to click it.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button is present and clickable on the product or home page.

phases.objective: Navigate to Arrive at the https://www.atob.com/get-started page.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the user is successfully redirected to the '/get-started' URL.

phases.objective: Navigate to Begin filling out the 'Sign up form', possibly recalling some previous information or having necessary documents ready.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the signup form is fully displayed and allows user input.

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and quickly scan the main headline and calls-to-action.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely without errors.
Verify that verify the main headline and primary calls-to-action are visible and legible.

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate and click the most prominent 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button on the homepage.
Navigate to Arrive at the https://www.atob.com/get-started page.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the user is redirected to the '/get-started' URL successfully.

phases.objective: Navigate to Efficiently fill in all required fields on the 'Sign up form'.

assertions.description: Verify that verify all required signup form fields are present and interactive.

phases.objective: Click the 'Submit Application' button to proceed.

assertions.description: Verify that verify the application submits successfully, leading to a confirmation or next step.
